home.name: Claudivan :)
home.message: I'm a developer transforming codes into solutions, how to transform a sheet on a paper airplane ready to fly.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Bachelor's Degree in Systems Analysis and Development and Postgraduate Degree in Full-Stack Development from XP Educação. I work as a developer Front-end, Back-end and Mobile, where I work with JavaScript applications. I have solid knowledge in: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, ReactJS, React Native, Node.js, Git and others. I look forward to joining the world of Python in the future.

interested.title: Interested? Lets Get In Touch!
interested.description: I'm open to freelance opportunities or remote position. Feel free to get in touch if you need help with your side/open source project. I would love to help. Whether developing a personal page or even more complex applications. Be up to date and have an innovative design, together we can do a lot and stay ahead. Technology and my knowledge are here to facilitate and offer more...
